pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, July 20, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hamilton, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks to recognize Eid al-Adha. Minister of Labour Filomena Tassi will also be in attendance.

Hamilton Mountain Mosque
1545 Stone Church Road East

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m. at the west end entrance.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen and Minister of Labour Filomena Tassi, will make a housing announcement. A media availability will follow.

Indwell’s Royal Oak Dairy
315 Robert Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Steel-toed safety boots and a non-medical mask are mandatory.

Media appearance

5:30 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Global News Toronto.
